channel.title: Need help on this one little thing
channel.description:
Well, i was adding Gem cutting just like real Rs. I added all gems + the shilo gems but when copmiling i got some erros.
When i was coding this i already knew this was going to give me errors but i said i'd finish it first and then i would try to fix it. This is what i am getting the error on. [code] addSkillXP(67,5, 12);[/code] Cutting the gem would give me 67,5Xp But i cant use a , to get to 67,1/2 I tryd doing this [code] addSkillXP(67.5, 12);[/code] As you can see i now used a period instead of a comma. But still i got the same error.
What would i need to type to make it give me 67,5 (67,1/2) Xp? Please help.

item.title: Need help on this one little thing
item.dc:creator: @J03RY J03RY
item.description:
@J03RY wrote:

Becouse i need this to have Crafting 100% like runescape
I got EVRYTHING for crafting 100% like runescape.
Making rings,neclases,amulats and so on.
I also got hide tanning and armour crafting.
but to make it 100% like runescape i need to have the excact XP for this.

So please dont post if you dont got anythign usefull to say.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help on this one little thing
item.dc:creator: @J03RY J03RY
item.description:
@J03RY wrote:

Well, i was adding Gem cutting just like real Rs.
I added all gems + the shilo gems but when copmiling i got some erros.

When i was coding this i already knew this was going to give me errors but i said i’d finish it first and then i would try to fix it.
This is what i am getting the error on.

		addSkillXP(67,5, 12);

Cutting the gem would give me 67,5Xp
But i cant use a , to get to 67,1/2
I tryd doing this

		addSkillXP(67.5, 12);

As you can see i now used a period instead of a comma.
But still i got the same error.

What would i need to type to make it give me 67,5 (67,1/2) Xp?
Please help.
